Package tables

Class TableManager

  • Object
    • RestaurantManager
      • TableManager
  • public class TableManager
extends RestaurantManager
    Manages table, order information in the restaurant list database through a CLI. Additionally manages reservation information within each table object.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private LocalTime AM_CLOSING
      Constant of restaurant closing hour for the morning session.
      private LocalTime AM_OPENING
      Constant of restaurant opening hour for the morning session.
      private LocalTime PM_CLOSING
      Constant of restaurant closing hour for the afternoon session.
      private LocalTime PM_OPENING
      Constant of restaurant opening hour for the afternoon session.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TableManager

        public TableManager​(Restaurant restaurant)
             throws Exception
        Initialises the manager with a restaurant object for data storage and manipulation. Reservations are checked for each table, and expired reservations (over 30 minutes) will be removed.
        Parameters:
        restaurant - Restaurant instance from main.
        Throws:
        Exception - Errors that occurred while checking reservations.

      • display

        private void display​(int which)
        Maps to the various methods to run. Used as some methods throw exceptions, which will be caught by this method for logging purposes.
        Parameters:
        which - Which method to run.

      • viewTable

        private void viewTable()
                throws Exception
        Displays all tables along with their occupancy and reservation status. Reservation status are displayed for the current session only.
        Throws:
        Exception - Errors that occurred while displaying the table information.

      • viewOrder

        private void viewOrder​(Table table)
        Displays order details for the specified table.
        Parameters:
        table - Table to display the order from.

      • createNewOrder

        private void createNewOrder()
                     throws Exception
        Creates a new order given a number of pax.
        Throws:
        Exception - Errors that occurred while creating an order.

      • manageOrders

        private void manageOrders()
                   throws Exception
        Manages open orders in the restaurant list database.
        Throws:
        Exception - Errors that occurred while managing orders.

      • addItemToOrder

        private void addItemToOrder​(Table table)
                     throws Exception
        Adds menu items into an open order.
        Parameters:
        table - The table which the order is attached to.
        Throws:
        Exception - Errors that occurred while adding items into the order.

      • removeItemsFromOrder

        private void removeItemsFromOrder​(Table table)
                           throws Exception
        Removes existing items in an open order.
        Parameters:
        table - The table which the order is attached to.
        Throws:
        Exception - Errors that occurred while removing items from the order.

      • voidOrder

        private void voidOrder​(Table table)
                throws Exception
        Voids an open order without sales recording.
        Parameters:
        table - The table which the order is attached to.
        Throws:
        Exception - Errors that occurred while voiding the order.

      • showReservations

        private void showReservations()
                       throws Exception
        Displays all reservations and their details.
        Throws:
        Exception - Errors that occurred while displaying the reservations.

      • newReservation

        private void newReservation()
                     throws Exception
        Makes a new reservation for a table.
        Throws:
        Exception - Errors that occurred while making the reservation.

      • manageReservations

        private void manageReservations()
                         throws Exception
        Manages existing reservations under a contact number.
        Throws:
        Exception - Errors that occurred while managing the reservations.

      • fulfilReservation

        private void fulfilReservation​(Table.Reservation reservation)
                        throws Exception
        Fulfil a reservation and opens an order for that reservation.
        Parameters:
        reservation - Reservation to fulfil.
        Throws:
        Exception - Errors that occurred while fulfilling the reservation.

      • deleteReservation

        private void deleteReservation​(Table.Reservation reservation)
                        throws Exception
        Removes a reservation from a table.
        Parameters:
        reservation - Reservation to remove.
        Throws:
        Exception - Errors that occurred while removing the reservation.

      • checkReservations

        private void checkReservations()
                        throws Exception
        Checks existing reservations. Expired reservations (over 30 minutes) are removed for their respective tables. Sets tables with reservations in the current session to reserved status.
        Throws:
        Exception - Errors that occurred while checking the reservations.

      • printBill

        private void printBill​(Table table)
                throws Exception
        Prints the bill invoice for a specified table.
        Parameters:
        table - Table to print invoice for.
        Throws:
        Exception - Errors that occurred while printing the bill invoice.

      • getAvailableTable

        private Table getAvailableTable​(LocalDateTime dateTime,
                                int pax)
                         throws Exception
        Searches the restaurant list database for an available table for a given dateTime and pax.
        Parameters:
        dateTime - The date and time to obtain an available table for.
        pax - Number of pax to obtain an available table for.
        Returns:
        Available table found in the database.
        Throws:
        Exception - Errors that occurred while searching for an available table, or if no table is available for the specified pax at the specified date and time.

      • getTableDisplayList

        private List<String> getTableDisplayList​(int sortOption)
                                  throws Exception
        Formats the data objects obtained from the restaurant list database into table-friendly format.
        Parameters:
        sortOption - Determines which comparator to sort the formatted list by.
        Returns:
        List of formatted object data. One object per entry.
        Throws:
        Exception - Errors that occurred while obtaining data objects.
